language.name: English
language.warning: A restart is required for changes to take effect!

language.name: Deutsch

language.warning: Un redémarrage est nécessaire pour la prise en compte des changements !

language.name: Italiano
language.warning: I cambiamenti saranno effettivi al prossimo riavvio!

language.name: Русский
language.warning: Перезагрузите игру, чтобы изменения вступили в силу!

language.name: Español
language.warning: ¡Es necesario reiniciar para que los cambios surtan efecto!

language.name: Português (Brasil)
language.warning: Para que as mudanças funcionem, é preciso reiniciar!

language.name: 简体中文

language.name: 繁體中文
